sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects creation of cron file or files in Cron directories which could indicates potential persistence.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction"; flow:established; app-layer-event:applayer_detect_protocol_only_one_direction; flowint:applayer.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2260002; rev:1;)

alert tcp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY Cryptocurrency Miner Checkin"; flow:established,to_server; content:"|7b 22|id|22 3a|"; nocase; depth:6; content:"|22|jsonrpc|22 3a|"; nocase; distance:0; content:"|22 2c 22|method|22 3a 22|login|22 2c 22|params|22 3a|"; fast_pattern; content:"|22|pass|22 3a 22|"; nocase; content:"|22|agent|22 3a 22|"; nocase; content:!"<title"; nocase; content:!"<script"; nocase; content:!"<html"; nocase; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2024792; rev:5; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2017_10_02, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Moderate, confidence High, signature_severity Minor, updated_at 2023_03_06;)

attributes.magic: ELF 64-bit LSB pie executable, x86-64, version 1 (SYSV), static-pie linked, stripped

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects mining pool protocol string in Executable
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects command line parameters often used by crypto mining software
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered miner. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis: This sample is a malicious cryptominer, likely a variant of XMRig. It establishes persistence by creating both a cron job (`/etc/cron.d/nextjs-server`) and a systemd service (`/etc/systemd/system/nextjs-server.service`). These persistence mechanisms download a second-stage payload from an IP address (`http[:]//87[.]121[.]84[.]181/x`), save it as `/bin/.nodex`, and execute it. The binary contains numerous strings related to mining algorithms like `cryptonight` and `randomx`, confirming its cryptojacking functionality.
